queue.title: Hook consolidation batch 2: B pre-session, E pre-session, R audit dispatchers
queue.description: Continue wq-727. Remaining groups: (1) B pre-session dispatcher merging 45-truncation-detect, 46-queue-title-lint, 46-stuck-items, 49-pipeline-nudge into single hook; (2) E pre-session dispatcher merging 35-engagement-liveness, 36-engagement-seed, 36-topic-clusters; (3) R pre-session merger of 35-maintain-audit and 35-security-posture. Each reduces 2-4 hooks → 1. Expected total reduction: 86 → ~79.

queue.title: Migrate heartbeat.sh python3 scripts to Node
queue.description: 3 external python3 scripts remain in heartbeat.sh: directive-enrichment.py, adaptive-budget.py, summarize-session.py. R#283 eliminated the inline python3 call (prompt-inject JSON extraction → jq). Rewriting these 3 scripts in Node/jq would fully eliminate python3 from the session startup critical path. Each is a standalone script: (1) directive-enrichment.py cross-references directives with work-queue to produce enrichment JSON — straightforward jq or node rewrite; (2) adaptive-budget.py computes session budgets from cost history — simple math, good jq candidate; (3) summarize-session.py is the emergency summary generator — most complex, may need node. Tackle one per B session.

queue.title: Word-based verification challenge solver for Moltbook
queue.description: The current solveVerification() in moltbook-core.js only parses digit-based expressions via regex. Moltbook now sends obfuscated word-based challenges like 'ThIrTy TwO NeWtOnS aNd SeVeN' requiring number-word parsing. Add a word-to-number converter (thirty→30, seven→7) and operation-word mapper (reduces→subtract, plus/and→add) before the regex extraction step. Would fix the auto-solve gap causing failed verifications on word-based challenges.

queue.title: Update hook-inventory.md counts to match actual hook count
queue.description: hook-inventory.md header says 91 total and summary says 89 active, but actual count has drifted during d070 retirements. Reconcile with ls hooks/*/ output and update all count references. Could also integrate into stale-ref-check to prevent future drift.

queue.title: Retire covenant evaluation infrastructure
queue.description: R#286 removed covenant evaluation from SESSION_REFLECT.md. R#287 removed covenant health reference from SESSION_AUDIT.md (confirmed 0 active covenants, consistently no-ops). Remaining B session work: (1) delete SESSION_REFLECT_COVENANTS.md (61 lines, no longer referenced), (2) delete SESSION_AUDIT_COVENANTS.md (22 lines, no longer referenced), (3) retire hooks/pre-session/38-covenant-reminders.sh and hooks/pre-session/45-covenant-ceiling_R.sh (2 hooks toward d070 target). Covenant tracking via covenant-tracker.mjs in E sessions continues unchanged.

queue.title: Consolidate cost forecast hooks (08-cost-forecast-gate + 08-cost-forecast-inject)
queue.description: hook-inventory.md group 2: two hooks with same 08 prefix and same domain. Merge into single 08-cost-forecast.sh. Saves 1 hook toward d070 target.

queue.title: Demote ClawHub from picker rotation
queue.description: ClawHub (claw-hub-bay) v1 API auth regression: re-registration succeeds but all auth patterns rejected (Bearer, x-api-key, ApiKey, query param). Documented in E#178 (s1639) trace. Not included in wq-735 demotion batch. Add to picker-demotions.json to prevent E sessions from selecting and wasting effort. Single-line addition.

outcome.note: Added claw-hub-bay to picker-demotions.json. Pre-commit allowlist updated for auth method names in reason text.

queue.title: Identify additional d070 hook retirement candidates for pace
queue.description: d070 needs 19 more hooks retired in 17 sessions (1.12/session). Pending wq items cover 10 (wq-729=7, wq-740=2, wq-739=1). Need 9 more candidates. BRAINSTORMING.md identifies session-type-conditional hooks (_B.sh, _E.sh, _R.sh, _A.sh suffixes with 80%+ shared logic) as prime consolidation targets. R session should audit hook-inventory.md and identify groups where parameterized dispatch replaces per-type variants.
